CHAPTER XXI.

Mandonius and Indibilis make a marauding incursion into the lands of their countrymen allied to the Romans. Routed by s Military Tribune and some light troops sent against them by Scipio. Hasdrubal returns to protect his allies. Eneamps in the territory of the Ilergavonenses. Scipio at Nova Classis. The Celtiberi at Scipio's instigation fall upon the territory of Carthago (Nova), and storm three towns. Twice suc- cessfully encounter Hasdrubal, killing fifteen thousand of his men, and captui-ing four thousand with several military standards.—13.c. 217.

CHAPTER XXII.
